comments: Literally the best teacher I have ever had. I didn\'t even have to buy the book because she was so thorough. Very understanding, my cat ran away, and she let me leave class to go find him. Chemistry is not the same without her. Wish she taught organic here!

Megan Hess is the best instructor I have ever had at the college. She is clear, easy to understand, and knows how to teach! Afterall, she has a teacher degree too! This is so important, especially because it is a chemistry class. She is so fair, so clear, and so amazing at what she does. Her classes have lots of extra credit and the tests r easy.

By far the BEST science teacher I\'ve had. As a nursing major I\'ve taken many science classes (CHEM 110, 121, 131 BIO 118 160 260 241 242 NUTR) The best. Extra Credit, Good tests, clear instruction. Wish she could have taught all my classes.
You can tell that she teaches the class with passion and it is very apparent as to how she conveys it to the class.

She is great at what she does. Attend classes and take good notes you\'ll be fine. Always willing to help in anyway she can. I took her when she first started teaching in like 2001, nothing has changed about her teaching style but still very good at what she does.

The only teacher I would ever get up at 730 for, and I took her twice! Amazing teacher, just take good notes off her pwrpts and you\'ll be set! Very clear in her lectures, goes slow enough to allow good notes but not so slow that you\'re bored. I wish she taught bio as well!

Shes a great teacher, Her teaching is very clear, and very punctual, she had our finals graded and final grade hours after we got done. About the comment below you do have to study if you want an A, if you don\'t you will get C. Her test were tricky but she wants you to understand it. Great teacher and I like her a lot, HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Simply the easiest teacher you can have. I never had to refer to the textbook, i only opened it when i had to do the chapter reviews. She offers extra credit on the tests which are EXTREMELY easy. Best and easiest teacher by far. I never study for her class and I have an A! Take her class if you get the chance.

Simply the easiest teacher you can have. Tests are based on lectures. I never had to refer to the textbook, i only opened it when i had to do the chapter reviews. She offers extra credit on the tests which are EXTREMELY easy. Best and easiest teacher by far. I never study for her class and I have an A! Take her class if you get the chance.

Omg\r Best teacher ever!!! Makes chemistry just so so so east\xc2\xa1!\xc2\xa1!\xc2\xa1!... Ask anyone who has had Hess\r \r If your in lecture everyday you\'ll know what\'s on the tests\r Cheat sheet allowed on tests \r Tons of ec\r Textbooks esentiallt not needed\r \r Also Hess has a great attitude
Excellent very linear lots of ec in class\r Tests 100% based on lecture\r Her class is just SO SIMPLE because she is so good at explaining
